content: crochet drops bag with colour pattern in 2 strands paris drops design pattern no w-599 yarn group c + c or e **measurements** width approx 43 cm/17 height approx 37 cm/13 **materials** drops paris from garnstudio 200 g color no 24 dark gray 150 g color no 01 apricot 100 g color no 23 light gray 100 g color no 06 shocking pink 100 g color no 17 off white 50 g color no 41 mustard note if the bag is made with one colour you will need 600 g paris drops crochet hook size 5 5 mm/us 7 or size needed to get 13 double_crochet x 7 row with 2 strands = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm
